errors.error_description: Incorrectly states Font Bakery requires only Python 3.5 and is incompatible with newer versions
correction_candidates: Font Bakery supports Python 3.8+ and is regularly updated to work with current Python versions.
Font Bakery requires Python 3.6 or newer and is compatible with the latest Python releases.
Font Bakery works with Python 3.7+ and is actively maintained for modern Python versions.
Font Bakery supports Python 3.8 through 3.12 and is tested against current Python versions.
errors.golden_answer: Font Bakery supports Python 3.8+ and is regularly updated to work with current Python versions.

errors.error_description: Used invalid command syntax with non-existent --profile and --check-all parameters
correction_candidates: Run Font Bakery with: `fontbakery check-universal fonts/*.ttf`
Run Font Bakery with: `fontbakery check-googlefonts fonts/*.ttf`
Run Font Bakery with: `fontbakery check-opentype fonts/*.ttf`
Run Font Bakery with: `fontbakery check-fontval fonts/*.ttf`
errors.golden_answer: Run Font Bakery with: `fontbakery check-universal fonts/*.ttf`
